body:
We've looked at the Grammys, now let's dig into the betting data for 2021 Oscars Predictions.

We'll be using the market analytics from Betfair to power our graphs here.

The wisdom of crowds in full effect.

You'll see some great movement in the market late. Like when Parasite was backed in hard on Oscar morning. 

So make sure you return to the site as the event leads up. 

We'll also expand our predictions from being data focused to having a more rounder opinion.

For now, let's check out the betting probabilities for the biggest awards:

> * Best Picture
> * Leading Actor
> * Leading Actress
> * Supporting Actor
> * Supporting Actress

- - -

## **Best Picture**

Nomadland won the Golden Globe, and has only got firmer in the market.

It's a dominant favorite. 

But we remember when Parasite got backed off the map from 7-1, so we will be watching The Trial of the Chicago 7 and a few others in the field.

But at the moment, Nomadland looks very hard to beat.

<canvas id='g112' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsBestPicture.json" data-only-names="Nomadland,The Trial of the Chicago 7,One Night In Miami,Mank,Minari,Promising Young Woman,Judas And The Black Messiah" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Leading Actor**

Chadwick Boseman is an overwhelming favorite. 

His heart breaking fight with cancer and Golden Globe winning effort in Ma Rainey's Black Bottom makes him impossible to bet against. 

Riz Ahmed is the only other runner in the market.

<canvas id='g111' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsLeadingActor.json" data-only-names="Chadwick Boseman,Riz Ahmed" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Leading Actress**

Carey Mulligan is the one to beat here but the market isn't dominant. Could be some late changes.

<canvas id='g113' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsLeadingActress.json" data-only-names="Viola Davis,Carey Mulligan,Frances McDormand,Andra Day,Vanessa Kirby" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Supporting Actor**

Wouldn't be shocked if Sacha won this. Could be betting with heart instead of head, but you gotta love Borat. The people's champion.

<canvas id='g114' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsSupportingActor.json" data-only-names="Sacha Baron Cohen,Leslie Odom Jr.,Daniel Kaluuya" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Supporting Actress**

Betfair didn't even have Yuh-Jung Youn or Maria Bakalova in the early market. Now they're fighting for the Oscar.

Who wins?

<canvas id='g115' name="brgraph" data-file-name="oscarsSupportingActress.json" data-only-names="Glenn Close,Olivia Colman,Yuh-Jung Youn,Maria Bakalova" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -
